T16D4443:360b-0: @360b ` / mig 'byed mthong ba don ldan bzhugs so /
T16D4443:360b-4: // / * // rgya gar sh'a dzang gi sman pa yul ba ri
T16D4443:360b-5: bu ra nas 'ongs pa'i ma na ho'i lag len
T16D4443:360b-6: zin bris su dgod pa ni /
T16D4443:360b-7: de la sman dpyad zas spyod bzhi la /
T16D4443:360b-12: dang por dgongs mo nyal nas sang mig mi 'byed
T16D4443:360b-13: kyi bar du zas skom gyi rigs bkag / sprin
T16D4443:360b-14: med nyi mo dro sar nad pa dang sman pa
T16D4443:360b-18: me hrag du ba med pa /
T16D4443:360b-25: nang gi mig sman la bya phur leb 'dra ba /
T16D4443:360b-26: shing sman ganda pa ta gsum /
T16D4443:360b-27: rnga mong gi ko lpags kyi rngar /
T16D4443:361a-0: @361a * // rdza rngar 'jam pa rnams bsags rjes /
T16D4443:361a-1: nad pa dang sman pa gnyis kyi lham phud /
T16D4443:361a-2: sman pa'i lag pa gtsang bar bkrus /
T16D4443:361a-3: nas phud gnyis ka'i lag tu thogs nas gsol 'debs bden bdar brjod nas nas 'thor /
T16D4443:361a-4: yung ba brdar nas chu dang sbyar bas mig gang 'byed kyi smin ma'i ltag la byugs /
T16D4443:361a-5: de rjes mig g-yon ma lta bu 'byed na sman pa'i bus mo g-yas pa bslang zhing /
T16D4443:361a-6: nad pa'i lag pa spar 'dzings kyis bzung /
T16D4443:361a-7: de'i rjes mig gi 'grib kyi thad g-yon phyed na g-yon zur /
T16D4443:361a-8: dkar nag nas gang gi mtshams su gtsags bur dar
T16D4443:361a-9: dkar gyi skud pas sked bcings byas pa'i steng du
T16D4443:361a-10: rgya gram brgyab pa'i rtse nas nas phyed tsam mthong
T16D4443:361a-11: ba des bsnun nas pags pa phigs pa byas rjes
T16D4443:361a-12: thur ma bra bo 'dra bas tshad dar skud kyi
T16D4443:361a-13: mtshams su sleb pa rgyal mor btang /
T16D4443:361a-14: de nas rten 'brel gyi sog ma dkar po gcig
T16D4443:361a-15: gi sked pa gtubs nas nad pa dang rang nyid
T16D4443:361a-16: kyi bar la sog ma lag g-yas kyi de g-yon
T16D4443:361a-17: dang g-yon gyi de g-yas la bskyur rjes /
T16D4443:361a-18: lag g-yon gyis mig lpags yar 'then pa dang /
T16D4443:361a-19: g-yas kyis thur ma rgyal mo'i sgrib byed 'phan ltar
T16D4443:361a-20: bsgril bas thur mar sgrib byed 'khril nas rgyal mo
T16D4443:361a-21: nag sing nge byung ba dang thur ma'i sgab nas
T16D4443:361a-22: bteg bteg byed pa dang lag g-yon gyis mig gang
T16D4443:361a-23: 'byed kyi tshog sgang du sdeg sdeg byas pas 'grib
T16D4443:361a-24: log byung na sngar ltar bsgril nas bzhag / de
T16D4443:361a-25: nas mig gi mthong byed du rdzas kha dog sna
T16D4443:361a-26: tshogs pa che ba chung ba'i bar rim par bstan
T16D4443:361a-27: pas phra rags so sor dbye 'byed thub pa yod
T16D4443:361a-28: / de rjes mig la srin bal chur sbyangs ba bkab /
T16D4443:361a-29: me mdangs kyi bsros pas 'grib byed thon sla ba 'ong /
T16D4443:361a-30: de nas thur ma tshur bsgril nas bton /
T16D4443:361a-31: thur rtse yung ba'i chur bcug bas sgrib byed thur mar 'khril nas dngos su mthong ba yong /
T16D4443:361a-33: (rgya gar skad la rnyo don dzo ti) shin sman
T16D4443:361a-34: ginda pa ta (ni m'a'i) rnams chu thigs gnyis gsum
T16D4443:361a-35: rdo 'jam po'i steng blug par rim bzhin brdar ba'i
T16D4443:361a-36: skyo ma sngar gyi thur ma brgyab par bslan /
T16D4443:361b-0: de'i rjes srin bal @361b chur sbyangs bkab de steng ras dkar yung ba'i khu bar bcug pa bkab /
T16D4443:361b-1: rgyal mo dmar nag byung na dar dkar tshva snum bsres par spags pa bkab /
T16D4443:361b-2: dkar po byung na mtshal dkar ma btul ba dang dung gnyis brdar ba'i skyo ma gong ltar bslan /
T16D4443:361b-3: de nas srin bal chur sbyangs yung ba'i chur ras
T16D4443:361b-4: spags pa rim par bkab steng ras dkar gyis mig
T16D4443:361b-9: dngul gsum po mi gcig gis mgo thog tu bzhag nas /
T16D4443:361b-19: zhes pa tshar gsum bzlas la mig gi steng du
T16D4443:361b-20: phu gsum rgyab pas mig gi nad zug dang bgegs
T16D4443:361b-21: sogs zhi bar byed pa yin /
T16D4443:361b-22: gri chung nad pa'i rkang 'og tu 'dren /
T16D4443:361b-23: yang mig rus dang mig na na /
T16D4443:361b-24: tsan dan dmar po dang yung ba /
T16D4443:361b-25: rgya gar gyi btsag yug brdar ba'i skyo man sar byugs /
T16D4443:361b-26: zas skom chu grang gi zan bya sgong tsam dang /
T16D4443:361b-27: rtsam pa sman tsha btab pa'i tsha ba bardi ba
T16D4443:361b-28: nyin re kha skom na thug pa phor pa gsum
T16D4443:361b-30: zhag gsum gyi bar zas skyom 'di ma gtogs mi byed /
T16D4443:361b-31: spyod lam nyin mo gnyid mi nyal /
T16D4443:361b-32: ldan pa g-yas g-yon phab nas mi sdod /
T16D4443:361b-33: dgongs mo nyal sa steng shod la 'gro dgos yod
T16D4443:361b-34: tshe dal bus phyin nas nyal zhing rkang pa brkyangs
T16D4443:361b-35: chog / de nyin nas bzung zhag gsum gyi bar
T16D4443:361b-36: mig sman mig 'byed pa'i dus dang dgongs ja khar
T16D4443:361b-37: mig kha phye nas rdzas phra rags bstan pas gsal
T16D4443:361b-38: bar yong / de'i rjes mig sman re brgyab nas dkris ma sngar bzhin byed /
T16D4443:361b-39: rlung rtags kyis mgo dang mi rus la sogs na ba byung na snum bskol ba la /
T16D4443:361b-45: btsag yug rnams rim cha bskyed nas btab byugs pas phan zhing /
T16D4443:361b-50: gzer ba sogs rgyud ltar shes par bya'o //
T16D4443:361b-51: kye ma shar phyogs rin chen shel gyi gzhal yas na /
T16D4443:362a-2: sku yi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas //
T16D4443:362a-3: deng 'dir zhi ba'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol //
T16D4443:362a-5: kye ma lho phyogs rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas nas //
T16D4443:362a-6: bde chen padma ser po'i klong dkyil na //
T16D4443:362a-7: yon tan rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas //
T16D4443:362a-8: deng 'dir rgyas pa'i dbang dang byin rlabs stsol //
T16D4443:362a-9: nub kyi drang srong dmar po //
T16D4443:362a-10: kye ma nub phyogs rin chen mchong gi gzhal yas nas //
T16D4443:362a-11: bde chen padma dmar po'i dkyil dbus na /
T16D4443:362a-12: gsung gi rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas /
T16D4443:362a-13: deng 'dir dbang ldan dbang gi byin rlabs stsol //
T16D4443:362a-14: byang gi drang srong lngang [?] gu //
T16D4443:362a-15: kye ma byang phyogs rin chen g-yu yi gzhal yas nas //
T16D4443:362a-16: bde chen padma ljang gu'i gdan steng na //
T16D4443:362a-17: 'phrin las rigs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas //
T16D4443:362a-18: deng 'dir 'phrin las dbang dang byin rlabs stsol //
T16D4443:362a-19: dbus kyi drang srong mthing ga / kye ma dbus phyogs rin chen beed'ur gzhal yas nas //
T16D4443:362a-20: bde chen padma mthing ga'i klong dbus su //
T16D4443:362a-21: rigs ldan thugs kyi drang srong 'khor dang bcas //
T16D4443:362a-22: deng 'dir bsam tshad lhun grub dbang mchog stsol //
T16D4443:362a-23: khyod kyi bu brgyud slob brgyud thams cad la //
T16D4443:362a-24: drang srong rigs lnga sman skyong srung mar bcas //
T16D4443:362a-25: bskal pa ma stongs par du byin gyis rlobs //
T16D4443:362a-26: kye rin chen sna lnga beed'ur gzhal yas khang //
T16D4443:362a-27: dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga padma'i steng /
T16D4443:362a-28: rigs lnga pho brang 'ja' tshon 'khrigs pa'i dbus //
T16D4443:362a-29: mtshan dpes rab brgyan sangs rgyas sman gyi bla //
T16D4443:362a-30: ye shes lnga ldan sku lnga gsal bar sprul //
T16D4443:362a-31: re re'i 'od la 'khor gyi drang srong dang //
T16D4443:362a-32: lha dang drang srong phyi nang sde bzhis bskor //
T16D4443:362a-33: zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub rnam pa lnga'i //
T16D4443:362a-34: sman gyi bu mo rnam lnga gnas 'dir byon //
T16D4443:362a-35: dri bzang me tog glu gar du ma bcas //
T16D4443:362a-36: drang srong rnams la phyag dang mchod pa 'bul //
T16D4443:362a-48: dz'a ti zho drug / sug smel srang gang /
T16D4443:362a-49: pi pi ling zho drug / rgya gar gyi la la phud zho drug / kha che zho do //
T16D4443:362b-0: 'jam 'bras pags pa med pa zho @362b gsum /
T16D4443:362b-2: aa ru ra rus pa med pa zho drug / shu dag zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-3: ru rta zho drug / thal dkar rdo rje zho
T16D4443:362b-4: drug / kong po'i sga zho drug / sha 'bras
T16D4443:362b-5: zho gsum / ga bur zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-6: zi ra nag po zho drug / pho ba ri zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-11: sle tres zho drug / byi thang ka zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-12: ba ru ra zho drug / sgog pa 'khar nyag gsum /
T16D4443:362b-16: sa min pha la zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-18: tsi tra ka zho drug / dngul chu zho gang /
T16D4443:362b-19: gzi yod pa'i so ma ra tsa zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-20: bang ka dmar po'i snum nyag drug / til nag gi snum nyag gsum /
T16D4443:362b-22: nyungs kar gyi snum nyag drug / nya cho ba
T16D4443:362b-23: dkyus mtho gang lhag tsam bcu drug gi khu ba
T16D4443:362b-27: sman sprul sgor mo bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu ba ;
T16D4443:362b-28: phug ron gyi sha rul sums med pa bubs gcig btsos pa'i khu ba /
T16D4443:362b-29: 'bri mar lo bcu gnyis song ba nyag lnga /
T16D4443:362b-31: ra'i 'o ma phul gang sbyar ba rnams kyi byug pas /
T16D4443:362b-40: shu ba sogs chu ser grang ba la brten pa'i rigs mtha' dag la phan /
T16D4443:362b-41: nyi ma byung na dang de min me la bsros pa'i 'byug thengs gnyis byed /
T16D4443:362b-42: srong phyed re nad gzhi gang yod la bsku mnye
T16D4443:362b-43: zhib 'them byas pa'i lo gcig song na zhag bdun
T16D4443:362b-44: tshun la drag / na ba'i lo gnyis song na
T16D4443:362b-45: zhag bcu bzhir drag / gsum song na zhag nyi
T16D4443:362b-46: shu rtsa gcig la drag /'di khong du gtong rgyu'i
T16D4443:362b-47: sman nya phyis zho drug / la la phud zho
T16D4443:362b-48: drug / pi pi ling zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-50: kong sga zho drug / gser mdog rus med zho drug / ba ru ra zho gsum /
T16D4443:362b-56: so ma ra tsa zho gang /
T16D4443:362b-61: 'di rnams kyi khar bye dkar spar ba gang btab
T16D4443:362b-62: pa'i ril bu kham bu skam po tsam tho rangs
T16D4443:362b-63: chu skol dang yal gyis rta byas btang ngo //
T16D4443:363a-0: @363a * // rus gsar gyi thug pa tsha phyed tsha /
T16D4443:363a-1: ja la mar dang 'o ma med pa'i tsha phyed tsha ma gtogs zas kyi rigs mi gtong /
T16D4443:363a-2: phan yon mgo dang rna ba yan lag ma gtogs khong nad kyi rigs la phan /
T16D4443:363a-3: rgya gar gyi skad las mu dra phe na /
T16D4443:363a-4: bod skad la rgya mtsho'i s'u ba dngos /
T16D4443:363a-7: dz'a ti gsum cha bsnyams pa'i phye ma snum skol
T16D4443:363a-8: bar btab pa'i khu ba rna bar thigs pa gsum
T16D4443:363a-9: ri gnyis re blugs pas rna ba'i nad tsha grang
T16D4443:363a-10: kun la phan / ba'i 'o ma phul do //
T16D4443:363a-12: rgya gar gyi dha du ra zho drug zhib par
T16D4443:363a-13: btags snum dang 'o ma gnyis skol bar btab pa
T16D4443:363a-14: lus la byugs pas chu bsags /
T16D4443:363a-15: pho ba spos pa na zug che ba'i rigs la phan /
T16D4443:363a-16: zas spyod rtsam pa dang skom li shi 'bru bdun
T16D4443:363a-17: tsam chu phor gang la spangs pa'i khu bgrang mo
T16D4443:363a-18: gtong / gong gi sman rnams nyin re la 'byug thengs gnyis re byed /
T16D4443:363a-20: sman chen ser po dang dung me la bsregs pa
T16D4443:363a-21: pho ril gsum zho la bteg pa'i ril bu pho
T16D4443:363a-22: ril tsam sgril ba khong du btang bas cham pa
T16D4443:363a-24: zam ma zhu ba rnams la bsngags /
T16D4443:363a-25: sman ma zhu na dug ril ltag pa sprad ces pa yang 'di yin /
T16D4443:363a-26: 'khyags pa sogs grang ba'i nad rigs kun la phan /
T16D4443:363a-27: rgya gar gyi la la phud chu la thun che
T16D4443:363a-28: bar btab la skol ba'i khu ba phor pa do
T16D4443:363a-29: gsum tsam btang bas shal skyug gang rigs byung na
T16D4443:363a-30: phan / grang ba yun ring lo 'das 'grim pa
T16D4443:363a-31: la ko ci la me la bsregs pa dang la
T16D4443:363a-32: la phud shu dag gsum khram khrum brdungs pa thun
T16D4443:363a-33: che ba gsum zos pas phan /
T16D4443:363a-34: rtsam pa rtsam thug mdzo zho'i chu ras la btsags pa btang bas phan /
T16D4443:363a-35: pho ba 'bras bu gsum sdom chung ba la thag
T16D4443:363a-36: btang ba gcig zhib par btags pa'i khu ba mgo
T16D4443:363a-37: bo gzhogs phyed na (la nad) na gang na'i mig
T16D4443:363a-38: tu dar la btsags pa'i khu ba blugs pas phan
T16D4443:363a-42: btsag rnams brdar ba'i khu ba bal mchu la byugs pas phan /
T16D4443:363a-43: so mar tsa brdar ba'i khu ba mig gi mtha' la byugs pas na zug che ba la phan /
T16D4443:363a-45: ha ha tha gha ru la gha ru ra yi ke ke ma tsu li /
T16D4443:363a-46: aam ge he aam gha sam ai zhes lan gsum
T16D4443:363a-47: thal ba la sngags btab na kha rlang gi dug
